agenda_items.title:
AGENDA 
CITY COUNCIL SPECIAL CALLED MEETING
WEDNESDAY, AUGUST 14, 2024
ORDER OF BUSINESS

The City Council Special Called meeting will be held by videoconference and in the Council Chambers, 6th Floor at City Hall.    Individuals who wish to speak in accordance with the City Council Rules of Procedure must sign up with the City Secretary’s Office.  

The public may attend the meeting virtually; however, City Hall is available for those wishing to attend the meeting in person. 

The following videoconference link is available to the public to listen to the meeting and Communications, Outreach, and Marketing (COM) will also stream the City Council meeting on Spectrum Cable Channel 16 and bit.ly/cityofdallastv: 
https://dallascityhall.webex.com/dallascityhall/j.php?MTID=m37ff886e36772fc68ca44afdd751e0d7

A public hearing to receive comments and to approve an ordinance granting a request to change the name of S. Central Expressway (SH 310/US 175) between C.F. Hawn Freeway (US 175) and Al Lipscomb Way to “S.M. Wright Freeway (FWY)” - NC234-005 - Not to exceed $29,608.00 - Financing - General Fund
